mapper.delete: /* 1-5 하루 최대 적립 포인트 횟수 기준 삭제 */
mapper.insert: /* 3-2 포인트 타입 기준 등록 */ INSERT INTO point_save_use_type (point_save_use_type_code, point_save_use_type, code_use, set_datetime, admin_id, up_datetime) VALUES (#{newCode}, #{pointType}, #{codeUse}, CURDATE(), #{adminId}, CURDATE())

/* 2-2 포인트 만료 기간 기준 등록 */ INSERT INTO point_expire_standard (point_expire_standard_code, point_expire, code_use, set_datetime, admin_id, up_datetime) VALUES (#{newCode}, #{expirePeriod}, #{codeUse}, CURDATE(), #{adminId}, CURDATE())

/* 1-2 하루 최대 적립 포인트 횟수 기준 등록 */ INSERT INTO day_maximum_count (day_maximum_count_code, count_benefit_type, use_maximum_count, code_use, set_datetime, admin_id, up_datetime) VALUES (#{newCode}, "포인트", #{useMaxCount}, #{codeUse}, CURDATE(), #{adminId}, CURDATE())
mapper.select: /* 5-1 포인트 환급 기준 조회 */ SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(RS.point_refund_standard_code,'code',-1) AS UNSIGNED) AS No, RS.point_refund_standard_code AS '환급 기준 코드', SUT.point_save_use_type AS '포인트 타입', RS.minimum_refund_standard AS '최소 환급 포인트', RS.refund_unit AS '환급 단위', RS.refund_fee_rate AS '환급 수수료', CASE WHEN RS.code_use = 'Y' THEN '사용중' WHEN RS.code_use = 'N' THEN '사용중지' END AS '코드 사용 유무', RS.set_datetime AS '최초 등록일', RS.admin_id AS '관리자 ID', RS.up_datetime AS '최종 수정일' FROM point_refund_standard AS RS INNER JOIN point_save_use_type AS SUT ON RS.point_save_use_type_code = SUT.point_save_use_type_code ORDER BY No

/* 4-1 포인트 적립 기준 조회 */ SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PSS.point_save_standard_code,'code',-1) AS UNSIGNED) AS No, PSS.point_save_standard_code AS '적립 기준 코드', GS.grade_name AS '등급', GS.grade_name AS '등급', PSS.grade_attain_point AS '등급 달성 포인트', PSS.use_save_point AS '이용 포인트', CASE WHEN PSS.code_use = 'Y' THEN '사용중' WHEN PSS.code_use = 'N' THEN '사용중지' END AS '코드 사용 유무', PSS.set_datetime AS '최초 등록일', PSS.admin_id AS '관리자 ID', PSS.up_datetime AS '최종 수정일' FROM point_save_standard AS PSS INNER JOIN grade_standard AS GS ON PSS.grade_standard_code = GS.grade_standard_code ORDER BY No

/* 3-1 포인트 타입 기준 조회 */ SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(point_save_use_type_code,'code',-1) AS UNSIGNED) AS No, point_save_use_type_code AS '포인트 타입 코드', point_save_use_type AS '포인트 타입', CASE WHEN code_use = 'Y' THEN '사용중' WHEN code_use = 'N' THEN '사용중지' END AS '코드 사용 유무', set_datetime AS '최초 등록일', admin_id AS '관리자 ID', up_datetime AS '최종 수정일' FROM point_save_use_type ORDER BY No

/* 2-1 포인트 만료 기간 기준 조회 */ SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(point_expire_standard_code,'code',-1) AS UNSIGNED) AS No, point_expire_standard_code AS '유효 기간 코드', point_expire AS '유효 기간', CASE WHEN code_use = 'Y' THEN '사용중' WHEN code_use = 'N' THEN '사용중지' END AS '코드 사용 유무', set_datetime AS '최초 등록일', admin_id AS '관리자 ID', up_datetime AS '최종 수정일' FROM point_expire_standard ORDER BY No

/* 1-1 하루 최대 적립 포인트 횟수 기준 조회 */ SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(day_maximum_count_code, 'code', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) AS No, day_maximum_count_code AS dayMaximumCountCode, use_maximum_count AS useMaximumCount, CASE WHEN code_use = 'Y' THEN '사용중' WHEN code_use = 'N' THEN '사용중지' END AS codeUse, set_datetime AS setDatetime, admin_id AS adminId, up_datetime AS upDatetime FROM day_maximum_count WHERE day_maximum_count_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{type}, '%') ORDER BY No

/* 하루 최대 적립 포인트 횟수 숫자 증가 코드 가져오기 */
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 'day_maximum_count_point_code1' ELSE CONCAT('day_maximum_count_point_code', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(day_maximum_count_code,'code',-1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) END AS increaseCode FROM day_maximum_count
